CustomField.description: Defines the Defines the client contact who hired the Employee. They will be the Invoice Contact detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Hiring Manager (Invoice Hiring Manager)" is used. The Invoice Group By of "Client", "Hiring Manager (Invoice Client)", "PO Number" and "Invoice To Account" will use the Invoice Contact on the related Client. The Invoice Group By of "Assignment" and "Invoice To Contact" will use the Invoice To Contact detailed on the Assignment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the client contact who hired the Employee. They will be the Invoice Contact detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Hiring Manager (Invoice Hiring Manager)" is used.
CustomField.label: Client Hiring Manager
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Assignments with Contact as Client Hiring Manager
